features: Product includes - The Builder Construction Set comes with 136 pieces including nuts, bolts, a hammer, a screwdriver and more.

Perfect for the creative toddler - Start your budding engineer off on the right track with a Builder Construction Set. It’s the perfect gift at Christmas or over the holiday season for the creative toddler - designed for ages 3 and up.
Develops important skills – The Construction Set provides a fun way to practice creative experimentation and improve hand-eye coordination.

Safe for your child - Nothing is more important to us than safety. We know that children sometimes play with toys in other ways than expected, and that’s why we test our products thoroughly. We set very strict safety requirements, and in many cases our own testing is tougher than the legal requirements.
body.description: Design, build and rebuild again with the perfect building toy to test the minds of budding engineers. The 34587 Builder Construction Set contains all the components and tools you’ll need to build almost anything your mind can design. The Builder Construction Set contains 135 pieces including easy-to-use construction tools such as hammers, screwdrivers and wrenches, wooden and plastic parts as well as wheels, pivots and bolts - everything a young inquisitive mind needs. BRIO Builder provides children with both physical and mental challenges which they can learn from in an enjoyable and memorable way. While constructing a new toy, practice fine motor skills (dexterity) and hand-eye coordination. Use imagination, problem-solving and logical thinking to bring ideas to the world. The endless possibilities to create something exciting makes this the perfect STEM toy. This Builder Construction Set includes 135 pieces: 5x Easy-to-use Tools, 130x Construction Pieces

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BRIO Builder Bring your creations to life with the perfect building toy to challenge the imagination of budding engineers. With a variety of BRIO Builder sets, spend hours of meaningful family play time inventing and constructing your own toys.
About BRIO Create your own toys and feel like an inventor. Made with durable materials that withstand tough handling. No small parts and tested 25% beyond industry standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brio Great Value!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been searching for a set that uses tools and is made from wood and stumbled upon Brio. This is really a great set that is good for working on many skills such as sorting, number correspondence, numbers, colors, fine motor skills, tool function and vocabulary etc. Brio uses quality heavy plastic and real wood and gives you the basis for how to use connectors and what goes with what.Reviews have stated they wished this set came with instructions but that would not be anything more than another logo set. If you get the idea of creating your own toys/pieces then you will really enjoy this set. My son loves making his creations and so do I. He then plays with them and we take them apart. The bolts, nuts and other parts have great torque and are solid when attaching.Lots of value for the price and is a great developmental set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Our 5-year old grandson loves this set and is amazing with what he can build with it! Wish it had a way to keep all the parts in a neat container. But it’s a great educational toy that he loves!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Open Ended Toy
reviews.reviewText: We have two of these sets, which is nice for a starter set. I felt like one box was nice, but we just didn't have quite as much of the pieces we needed to build things we wanted to build. The price is not great for the amount that you get, however the quality is really good. I have 2.5 year old twins who bang away at it with the hammer, and it's holding up really well. There is a variety of screws, nails and connection pieces that give you a nice choice for how you want to build. There is an included inspiration book, but it only has two ideas for you to build and does not come with directions for how to build it, just what pieces you need. For us, this isn't a big deal, but my husband prefers directions and it drives him nuts. I like that this set is so open ended. We will definitely be adding to our collection over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best building set for young children
reviews.reviewText: As a kid who grew up with (and still plays with) Lego, Erector Sets, K'Nex, Lincoln Logs, Fiddlesticks, and who knows what other kids building materials, I think this is the best choice for a toddler who has taken an interest in putting things together. Even our almost 2 year old loves playing with the screwdriver. The kids always see us putting together furniture and want to jump in and help, so this was perfect for them. I think it's a much better educational tinker toy for children that young. It doesn't require too much dexterity and it still allows for a lot of freedom of creation. Also goes great with the Brio train sets, which my partner uses with lessons in her classroom. I got this kit, but would recommend the bigger box set that is around $70. There's not enough pieces to share if there's more than 1 kid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hands-down one of the best toys for ages 3+
reviews.reviewText: My 2.5 and 5 year olds LOVE this set. We purchased the bigger set for them for Christmas last year, but added this one since they were always running short on certain pieces. We try to stick to open-ended toys like this for them. This is one of the few building toys they have that requires zero adult help. My 5 year old builds the most incredible airplanes and my 2.5 year old loves building basic cars. The possibilities are endless and I love seeing what they come up with! Great quality as expected from Brio - has stood up well to my two boys!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Construction set for hours of play
reviews.reviewText: This has been one of the best purchases I have made for my son who is now 4. He will spend time every single day building a new "machine". He uses such creativity and comes up with all sorts of stuff. It doesn't come with too many ideas in the booklet which is for the better since it is great for free play and allows the child to use their own imagination. I was surprised at how heavy the hammer is for being plastic. It is definitely more heavy duty then any other play hammer I have come across. I would say the same thing about the screwdriver too. This is a QUALITY set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great construction kit for young kids that allows them to actually build stuff!
reviews.reviewText: I really love that Brio has created this serious construction set for preschoolers! I bought our set on the recommendation of an occupational therapist who uses it with her clients, and it has seen quite a bit of play from my three younger kids (aged 7, 5, and 2 - the 2yo needs help to make anything serious).This set provides great fine motor practice for kids!I do wish you could screw or hammer pieces into the plastic platforms - it would allow for even more construction options. Also, as other reviewers have noted, this kit does not come with instructions - it is a free build set for kids to use however they see fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hours of imaginative playtime
reviews.reviewText: Our boys enjoy using the pamphlets to build but also have great fun using their imaginations to create something new each time they play with this building set.
I love watching my kid express creativity using this stuff. The number of ways they find to use it and the number of things it can be is incredibly versatile. One of the premiere building toys.
Bra pris och uppskattad present till barn

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely great toy. Hours of fun in one box. The whole family will love it
ottimo, veramente bello ed interessante per i piccoli

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on December 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Niet geschikt voor kinderen vanaf drie.
reviews.reviewText: Dit aan mijn vijf jarige kleinzoon voor Sinterklaas gegeven. Het ziet er mooi uit.Maar het is moeilijk in en uit elkaar te halen.Zelfs als klussende opa heb ik er problemen mee. Trouwens een hele summiere beschrijving hoe je één en ander in elkaar moet zetten. Drie foto’s dat is all.
